title: Client Not Working
body:
Hi, 

I first had the issue mentioned [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/HvVNP8G7-client-issues-please-help-asap) and did all of the steps mentioned. None seemed to work, so I tried to uninstall my client, then reinstall but now after reinstalling, my client is stuck on [this](https://i.imgur.com/w20lsOA.png?1) and when completed after a very long time, it will say repair failed. This has happened several times now, even after trying to repeat the initial steps again.

replies.body: Hey there, sorry to hear you're still having issues here.  :(  The issue sounds like more security setting issues, which would best be solved with the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide similarly to your last post.  If you already have a ticket open, I recommend chatting with your tech specialist who should have more context specific to your case.
